div.p: Thanks for trying CC Host while we get our act together. Any suggestions, bugs or other comments? Send 'em on to fourstonesfooledya@sourceforge.net.

p.tal:block:
Here are some places to start :
To change css-skins use Settings
Change the Page Contents
To add administrators use Settings
Edit the Menus
Pick the allowable File Formats
You need to be logged in as Admin to configure the site.
